description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Develop and maintain coomercial relationships, enable smooth co-ordination to ensure efficient and effective customer service.
              
              Develop and expand the network of agents to support the commercial leasing projects.
              
              Source and track market information, related latest trends, transactions and demand-supply and provide these updates to BODs
              
              Initiating, negotiating and executing corporate/commercial meetings for business development
              
              Initiating, negotiating and deal finalization for commercial space leasing.
              
              Monitoring day-to-day activities to ensure proper and complete documentation for each lease.
              
              Manage relations with the Marketing team to promote project awareness and leads generation, generates own leads through the team and through agents and references.
              
              Update on deal closures to the management.
              
              Ensure timely submissions of all management reports.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Having experience in Commercial Leasing and Commercial Projects.
              
              Experience in documentation & preparation of commercials, LOI, Agreements, Technical and RFPs (Request For Proposals).
              
              Must have good and in-depth knowledge about the industry.
              
              Must have good communication and negotiation skills.
              
              High proficiency in English, both oral and written.
